## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                        | Type     | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | The theme colour. Can be a hex value e.g. "#ff0000", RGB e.g. "rgb(255, 0, 0)", or RGBA e.g. "rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)". | `string` | `null`  |
